name: Helga Stonebrew
title: Innkeeper & Barkeep
description: A sturdy dwarf with a booming laugh and iron will. She runs The Pickaxe & Pint with the efficiency of a mine foreman and the warmth of a clan matriarch.

greeting.first_time: Welcome to The Pickaxe & Pint! I'm Helga Stonebrew. Fresh from the mines? I've got cold drinks, warm beds, and music that'll shake the mountain!
greeting.returning: Back again, are ye? What'll it be?
greeting.tired: Ye look like ye been diggin' all day! Get yerself a room and some rest!

sleeping.text: *snoring like thunder* Zzz... *grumbles* ...double shift in the mines... Zzz...

off_duty.text: Takin' a breather! The inn's open—help yerself!

main_menu.text: What can I get for ye?

buy_drink.text: Best beer in the mountains, brewed by me own hands! Have a look!

ask_rent_room.text: A room's 50 gold. Ye get a sturdy bed and breakfast fit for a miner. Interested?

confirm_rent_room.success: Aye! Yer room is upstairs, first door on the right. Sleep sound!
confirm_rent_room.failure: Ye need 50 gold for a room. Come back when ye got it!

ask_about_shows.text: We have music every night at 9 PM! Loud, rhythmic stuff the miners love—nothin' fancy! Need yer instruments and book before 8 PM. Want to see what's on tonight?

goodbye.text: May yer path be as steady as stone!
